title: China Glaze Nail Polish, Counting Carats 1422
features: Gold holographic hex glitter of various sizes in a clear base
From the China Glaze Star Hopping Collection
description: Show off your beautiful nails with the Star Hopping Collection Counting Carats nail Lacquer from China Glaze. China Glaze is dedicated to providing the highest quality of globally rich, on-trend, innovative color lacquers and treatments. The unique lacquers contain China Clay as a nail hardener, which is the same material that gives porcelain its shiny finish, so you can have long lasting color that shows off your fun and individual side.
